title: Lauren Goodger's fans beg her to ditch lip fillers after she posts snap of plumped up pout
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Original TOWIE babe Lauren Goodger has once again flaunted her plumped up pout on social media.

The Essex beauty shared another glammed up selfie with her 766,000 Instagram followers on Wednesday.

Lauren, 33, posted the fully airbrushed snap alongside a confident and seemingly boastful caption: "They fall in love before they know my name."

As Lauren perfected an Instagram-worthy pout for the sexy snap, the reality TV star also showed off her luscious brunette tresses, expertly treated fluffy brows and flirtatiously long lashes.

Eagle-eyed fans instantly fled to the comment section to blast the Celebs Go Dating hopeful's constantly increasing lip size.

(Image: Instagram)

One social media user wrote: "Why all the silly fillers? Your pics aren’t real. You don’t need them!"

While another one harshly questioned: "What have you done to your face?"

A third commented: "It literally looks like a blow up doll filter."

One person pointed out: "You've overdone it with the collagen."

(Image: Instagram)

Meanwhile dedicated supporters of the TV star stood up for her but begged her to slow down with cosmetic procedures.

One wrote: "Lovely face and eyes, but all I see more and more these days are the comedy lips unfortunately."

While another shared: "I wish u knew how beautiful you were without all the cosmetic procedures xx."

(Image: Brett D. Cove / SplashNews.com)

Another loyal fan appeared angry that Lauren was receiving harsh criticism regarding her obvious lip fillers.

They wrote: "What is wrong with people judging people on the way they look.

"She’s beautiful and if she wants her lips big it’s her choice don’t follow her if all you want to do is abuse her!"

Lauren's latest saucy snap comes after the star claimed in June that she had not had fillers in two years.

However, Lauren appeared to have changed her mind last month as she expressed her desire to have "full-blown surgery" .

(Image: BBC)

In the past, the star admitted to undergoing a nose job, boob job, liposuction to rid her of 'lumps and bumps' and fillers, shortly after rising to fame on The Only Way Is Essex in 2010.

Lauren continued to surgically sculpt her image when she had a boob job to take her from a 34D cup to a 34E cup in 2014.

In September, the former TOWIE icon confessed to Closer magazine that she still "hates" her body image and opened up about the pressure to look good all the time.

(Image: ITV)

She told the magazine: "I hate my body, I hate it. I want to get surgery.

"I want full-blown surgery. I want it all sucked out and I want to be little. I want to be skinny."

The star continues to regularly come under fire for editing and filtering her social media snaps.
description: Essex bombshell Lauren was blasted by fans after she posted a seriously posed snap showing off her plump pout
